vulnerabilities.title: Tryton sao allows XSS via an HTML attachment
vulnerabilities.description: Tryton sao (aka tryton-sao) before 7.6.9 allows XSS via an HTML attachment. This is fixed in 7.6.9, 7.4.19, 7.0.38, and 6.0.67.

vulnerabilities.title: Tryton sao allows XSS because it does not escape completion values
vulnerabilities.description: Tryton sao (aka tryton-sao) before 7.6.11 allows XSS because it does not escape completion values. This is fixed in 7.6.11, 7.4.21, 7.0.40, and 6.0.69.
